mapper.select: select * from s_lord_pros order by prosLv
select * from s_combat order by combatId
select * from s_explore order by exploreId
select * from s_arena_award order by keyId
SELECT * FROM s_party_build_level order by type asc,buildLv asc
SELECT * FROM s_party_contribute order by keyId
SELECT * FROM s_task_live ORDER BY live asc
SELECT * FROM s_task_live_activity ORDER BY live asc
select * from s_slot order by keyId
select * from s_vip order by vip
select * from s_pay order by payId
select * from s_pay_ios order by payId
SELECT * FROM s_act_vacationland order by villageId ASC,onday asc
SELECT * FROM s_act_equate ORDER BY `type`,`equateId` ASC
SELECT * FROM s_rebel_hero_push ORDER BY levelup ASC
select id, awardid, type, item, price, probability, discount, especial, `desc` from s_act_quinn
select id, type, price from s_act_quinn_refresh
select id, type, number, awards from s_act_quinn_easteregg
select * from s_honour_score_gold order by id
select id,friend,prop,type from s_friend_gift order by id asc
